title: Include c10 namespace into caffe2 and at namespaces.
body_html:
Stack:
    ⚪️  #13024 Fix TensorList ambiguity  💛
    ⚫️  #12950 Include c10 namespace into caffe2 and at namespaces.  💚

For backwards compatibility, we want the c10 symbols to be reachable from caffe2 and aten.
When we move classes from at/caffe2 to c10, this

  1. allow keeping backwards compatibility with third paty code we can't control
  2. allows splitting diffs that move such classes into two diffs, where one only fixes the includes and the second one fixes the namespaces.

Differential Revision: D10496244

body:
Stack:
    :white_circle:  #13024 Fix TensorList ambiguity  [:yellow_heart:](https://our.internmc.facebook.com/intern/diff/D10518929/)
    :black_circle:  **#12950 Include c10 namespace into caffe2 and at namespaces.**  [:green_heart:](https://our.internmc.facebook.com/intern/diff/D10496244/)

For backwards compatibility, we want the c10 symbols to be reachable from caffe2 and aten.
When we move classes from at/caffe2 to c10, this
 1. allow keeping backwards compatibility with third paty code we can't control
 2. allows splitting diffs that move such classes into two diffs, where one only fixes the includes and the second one fixes the namespaces.

Differential Revision: [D10496244](https://our.internmc.facebook.com/intern/diff/D10496244/)
